item.title: Managing sustainability for competitive advantage
item.description: A required class in the Evening MBA program, providing students with the “sustainability literacy” that every manager needs. We work very much from the viewpoint of strategy, exploring the competitive implications of society’s increasing focus on sustainability. Syllabus Click here to download.

item.title: Global Innovation

item.title: Management of Technology 2
item.description: This was an elective class, which followed the required Management of Technology and Strategy classes in the Illinois MBA. Management of Technology I was intended to provide the basic information any manager needs to manage in a technologically vibrant marketplace. This class was for students who intended to work more directly with technology and innovation. Syllabus Click here to download.
